code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EmployeeProfile=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[employee,setEmployee]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchEmployeeDetails=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");const response=await axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/employees/${id}/`,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});setEmployee(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching employee details",error);}};fetchEmployeeDetails();},[id]);if(!employee){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading employee details..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"employee-profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Employee Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Name:"})," ",employee.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",employee.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Role:"})," ",employee.role]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Salary:"})," $",employee.salary]})]});};export default EmployeeProfile;
